description: Read configuration values from Kubernetes ConfigMap or Secret resources. Note that to read a config value from a Secret, you must set `secret = true`. Otherwise Waypoint will load a dynamic value from a ConfigMap.
name: kubernetes

optionalFields.Synopsis: the namespace to load the ConfigMap or Secret from.
optionalFields.Summary: by default this will use the namespace of the running pod. If this config source is used outside of a pod, this will use the namespace from the kubeconfig.

optionalFields.Synopsis: This must be set to true to read from a Secret. If it is false we read from a ConfigMap.

requiredFields.Synopsis: the key in the ConfigMap or Secret to read the value from
requiredFields.Summary: ConfigMaps and Secrets store data in key/value format. This specifies the key to read from the resource. If you want multiple values you must specify multiple dynamic values.

requiredFields.Synopsis: the name of the ConfigMap of Secret
